Aardwolf_Disarmed.xml.name: Aardwolf_Disarmed
Aardwolf_Disarmed.xml.description: Handles all types of being disarmed. Handles normal, cursed, owned, and scripted event disarms.

Aardwolf_Portal_Adder.xml.name: Aardwolf_Portal_Adder
Aardwolf_Portal_Adder.xml.description: Creates a command to bridge dinv and mapper, making adding portals to mapper much easier to manage.

szz_new_character_statmon.xml.name: szz_new_character_statmon
szz_new_character_statmon.xml.description: Replaces old character stats/info window with a new one that contains more information, and is customizable.
